title: PBL-Based Educational Curriculum for Strengthening Welding Engineering Field Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and general understanding of welding processes
context.additional_context: PBL environment focused on solving real-world welding challenges in industrial settings. Integration of digital resources via BYOD policy and small-group collaborative learning

learning_goals: Analyze welding defects in actual industrial settings and propose appropriate solutions
Make decisions considering material properties and environmental factors when designing welding processes
Demonstrate communication and leadership competencies during team-based problem-solving processes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
